items.title: Diddy trial live updates: Dawn Hughes testifies in Sean Combs’s sex-trafficking case; Kid Cudi set for Thursday
items.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs’s federal sex-trafficking trial continues on Day 8, with Kid Cudi, Dawn Hughes and George Kaplan expected to testify this week.

items.title: Deal on SALT comes into focus but upsets budget hawks

items.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the Republican-led Congress.
